definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

sentences.english: Objective To study the surgical treatment in massive hemorrhage of gastroduodenal ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胃十二指肠溃疡大出血的外科治疗。

sentences.english: Surgery was curative in 54 patients and palliative in 27 patients.
sentences.chinese: 行胰十二指肠切除术54例，姑息性手术27例。

sentences.english: Pancreatoduodenectomy has been one of the most complicate operations in general surgery.
sentences.chinese: 胰头十二指肠切除术是普通外科最复杂的手术之一。

sentences.english: And then anastomosed duodenum and the right wall of bladder.
sentences.chinese: 十二指肠节段与膀胱吻合。

sentences.english: Objectives To investigate the effect of the treatment of biliary ascarid with duodenoscopy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨十二指肠镜治疗胆道蛔虫病的效果。

sentences.english: A portion of the pancreas is shown as an echogenic structure between the stomach and the duodenum.
sentences.chinese: 胰腺的一部分回声结构显示在胃和十二指肠之间。

sentences.english: Returning to the right kidney find the descending duodenum and the pancreas.
sentences.chinese: 回到右肾，找到下行十二指肠，与胰脏。

sentences.english: Bile is introduced into the duodenum by the bile duct.
sentences.chinese: 胆汁是通过胆道进入十二指肠的。

sentences.english: Diagnosis and treatment of pancreatic and duodenal injury.
sentences.chinese: 十二指肠损伤的特点及其诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize a single center's experience of the prophylaxis and treatment of pancreatic fistula secondary to pancreaticoduodenectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨胰十二指肠切除术后胰疹的预防与治疗。

sentences.english: Peptic ulcer disease usually occurs in the stomach and duodenum.
sentences.chinese: 消化性溃疡主要发生于胃和十二指肠。

sentences.english: Objective To explore treatments of perioperative period in pancreaticoduodenectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索胰十二指肠切除术围手术期治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the diagnostic rate of duodenal bulbar ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高十二指肠球部溃疡的诊断率。

sentences.english: There was muscularis mucosa in ventriculus and duodenum.
sentences.chinese: 胃和十二指肠可见粘膜肌层。

sentences.english: Pancreatoduodenectomy may be one of the most complicated operations in general surgery.
sentences.chinese: 胰头十二指肠切除术是普通外科最复杂的手术之一。

sentences.english: Analyse the reviewing to the case of excising the skill of 24 cases of pancreas duodenum.
sentences.chinese: 对24例胰十二指肠切除术的病例进行回顾性分析。

definition: transverse colon (anatomy)/second section of large intestine
sigmoid colon (anatomy)/bent colon, linking the descending colon to the rectum
jejunum (empty gut, middle segment of small intestine between duodenum 十二指腸|十二指肠[shi2 er4 zhi3 chang2] and ileum 回腸|回肠[hui2 chang2])

ascending colon (anatomy)/first section of large intestine
